1.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
1.description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

2.name: Stripes
2.description: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

3.name: For Your Eyes Only
3.description: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

4.name: An American Werewolf in London
4.description: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

5.name: The Evil Dead
5.description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

6.name: Excalibur
6.description: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

7.name: Das Boot
7.description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

8.name: Escape from New York
8.description: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

9.name: Porky's
9.description: In 1954, a group of Florida high school students try to help their buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seeking revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.

10.name: Mad Max 2
10.description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline rich community escape a horde of bandits.

11.name: Possession
11.description: A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.

12.name: Endless Love
12.description: A high school student's love for a 15-year-old girl is thwarted by parental disapproval, circumstance and accident.

13.name: Friday the 13th Part 2
13.description: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant.

14.name: Clash of the Titans
14.description: Perseus must battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

15.name: Body Heat
15.description: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.

16.name: The Cannonball Run
16.description: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

17.name: Halloween II
17.description: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

18.name: Time Bandits
18.description: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

19.name: Mommie Dearest
19.description: The abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother, screen queen Joan Crawford, is depicted.

20.name: The Howling
20.description: After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.

21.name: Scanners
21.description: A scientist sends a man with extraordinary psychic powers to hunt others like him.

22.name: History of the World: Part I
22.description: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.

23.name: Taps
23.description: Military cadets take extreme measures to insure the future of their academy when its existence is threatened by local condo developers.

24.name: Arthur
24.description: Arthur spends his time with booze and whores. His dad has a wife lined up for him that he keeps rejecting - until it's her or being cut off from $750,000,000. Then he goes shopping where he falls in love with a shoplifter.

25.name: Heavy Metal
25.description: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

26.name: The Burning
26.description: A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.

27.name: Chariots of Fire
27.description: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

28.name: The Postman Always Rings Twice
28.description: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

29.name: Victory
29.description: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.

30.name: Neighbors
30.description: A quiet man's peaceful suburban lifestyle is threatened by the new, obnoxious couple that moves in next door.

31.name: Thief
31.description: Coming closer to his dream of leading a normal life, a professional safecracker agrees to do a job for the Mafia, who has other plans for him.

32.name: Private Lessons
32.description: An immigrant housemaid seduces a 15-year-old boy and later fakes her own death as part of his chauffeur's blackmail plot. Troubles arise when the two start to fall in love.

33.name: On Golden Pond
33.description: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

34.name: Tarzan the Ape Man
34.description: While on an African expedition with her father, Jane Parker meets Tarzan, and the two become fascinated by each other.

35.name: The Fox and the Hound
35.description: Two childhood friends find themselves forced to become enemies.

36.name: La guerre du feu
36.description: This story takes place in prehistoric time when three tribesmen search for a new fire source.

37.name: Blow Out
37.description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

38.name: Dragonslayer
38.description: A young wizarding apprentice is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom.

39.name: Night Warning
39.description: An orphaned teenager finds himself being dominated by his aunt who's hell-bent on keeping him with her...at all costs.

40.name: Galaxy of Terror
40.description: Science fiction suspense thriller, in which a rescue space ship crew meets up with horrors projected by their own imaginations.

41.name: My Bloody Valentine
41.description: A decades-old folk tale surrounding a deranged murderer killing those who celebrate Valentine's Day turns out to be true to legend when a group defies the killer's order and people start turning up dead.

42.name: Piranha Part Two: The Spawning
42.description: A scuba diving instructor, her biochemist boyfriend, and her police chief ex-husband try to link a series of bizarre deaths to a mutant strain of piranha fish whose lair is a sunken freighter ship off a Caribbean island resort.

43.name: Cannibal ferox
43.description: Three friends out to disprove cannibalism meet two men on the run who tortured and enslaved a cannibal tribe to find emeralds, and now the tribe is out for revenge.

44.name: Eye of the Needle
44.description: A ruthless German spy, trying to get out of Britain with vital information about D-Day, must spend time with a young woman and her crippled husband.

45.name: Happy Birthday to Me
45.description: At the snobby Crawford Academy, Virginia's group of friends start to go missing years after horrible events that happened to her as a child around her birthday.

46.name: Southern Comfort
46.description: During a routine exercise, a team of National Guards are threatened by angry and violent locals.

47.name: Wolfen
47.description: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

48.name: L'ultimo squalo
48.description: James Franciscus tries to save hundreds of swimmers in a coastal resort after a Great White Shark starts terrorizing the area.

49.name: Caveman
49.description: A cave-man seeks revenge on a much larger competitor for the hand of a beautiful cave-woman.

50.name: ...E tu vivrai nel terrore! L'aldilà
50.description: A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.
